page.title: 18A Day in the Life of A.Blair
page.content: The evening papers arrive off the {16.30}bus _ another rush of customers into the shop _ some wanting papers _ others are children off the Hexham and Haydon Bridge School buses.Among them is my daughter Tessa. It is{17.45}Time to shut and go upstairs to rest.No such luck.My shop has been so busy all week what with the good sunny weather and all the holidaymakers that we are running short of sweets,pop,crisps etc...We decide to go to a Cash and Carry Supermarket at Newcastle.No time for dinner.Sandwiches are prepared and off we go.A quick run through the Cash and Carry with a trolley,back into the car and off home.In Hexham we are feeling hungry,so we stop in the Market Place to go the Chinese take_away.We buy two helpings of Beef Chow Mein,then we head for home once again.
